Some text here.

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

params$county
year <- 2025

```


```{r}
undirected_results <- readRDS(paste0("../results/undirected_results", year, ".rds")) |> 
  filter(county == params$county)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

undirected_results |>
  count(roadCategory) |>
  arrange(roadCategory) |>
  kable(
    col.names = c("Vegkategori", "Antall trafikklenker"),
    format.args = list(big.mark = " ")
  )
```
